generated_text:
- road: The paved surface with markings visible in the foreground and extending into the scene is clearly a road.
- sidewalk: The paved area where pedestrians are walking, bordered by curbs and poles, is a sidewalk.
- building: The multi-story structures with windows and architectural details on both sides of the street are buildings.
- vegetation: The large, leafy trees providing shade over parts of the scene are vegetation.
- sky: The visible portion of the sky above the trees and buildings is open sky.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking or standing on the sidewalk or near the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the left side of the image.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked near the kiosk and along the sidewalk.
- car: A white van is visible in the background on the right side of the image.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are mounted on poles, including a circular sign and directional signs.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible on a pole on the right side of the image.
